author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds performance improvements to the L1Trigger/VertexFinder package. It also brings the output of the package in line with the L1TTrackMatch:L1TkPrimaryVertexProducer output, but does supersede that older piece of code in functionality. The L1TkPrimaryVertexProducer is removed and all upstream consumers switched to using the VertexProducer from L1Trigger/VertexFinder.

Another major update is that the VertexProducer is changed to be an edm::global::EDProducer. This, coupled with some additional new producers. Allows much of the code to be multi-threaded. This doubles the speed of the ntupler.

#### PR validation:

The output of the VertexNtupler from L1Trigger/VertexFinder was compared to the output from L1TrackObjectNtupleMaker in L1Trigger/L1TTrackMatch. By matching the two outputs we can see that the output of the newer VertexProducer matches that of the older piece of code.

Backport of https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/882
